text: Yara balechila -- ''nihsandeha allah amadera kache angikara karechena ye amara kono rasulera prati imana anabo na ye paryanta na tini amadera kache emana kurabani anena yake aguna puriye thake.’’ Tumi balo -- ''niscaya'i amara age tomadera kache rasulagana esechilena spasta pramanabali niye ara tomara yara katha balacho ta niye, tabe kena tomara tamdera hatya karate yacchile, yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o.’’
